entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS AROUND 60

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
SHOWERS
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
